heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Worker Participation (State Enterprises)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Worker Participation (State Enterprises) 

Act 1988 (Section 9) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited worker participation (state enterprises) act 1988 (section 9) order 2021

title: making of this Order, and that company has sent a copy of the request to Mr
heading: 2. Every employee of Aer Rianta International cpt (ARI) shall, for the
text_raw:
2. Every employee of Aer Rianta International cpt (ARI) shall, for the 
purposes of the Worker Participation (State Enterprises) Acts 1977 to 2001, be 
regarded as an employee of daa plc.
text_norm: 2 every employee aer rianta international cpt (ari) shall purpose worker participation (state enterprises) act 1977 2001 regarded employee daa plc

text_raw:
3. Every employee of daa International Ltd (daaI) shall, for the purposes 
of the Worker Participation (State Enterprises) Acts 1977 to 2001, be regarded 
as an employee of daa plc.

heading: GIVEN under my hand,
text_raw:
4. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 22 September 2021 

DAMIEN ENGLISH, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, 

Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [484] 3

title: making of this Order, and that company has sent a copy of the request to Mr
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The effect of this Order is to allow employees of Aer Rianta International cpt 
(ARI) and daa International Ltd (daaI) to participate in the election of 
employee representatives to the board of daa plc. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [484]
